评论详情: This is beautiful
I like that it has lining, looks better with a bra in my opinion. The color is a little brighter than I anticipated but overall pretty and what I expected for the price I paid.
Absolutely beautiful dress that is so flattering. It’s a must have. I wanna get it in every single color. I’m small chested so I fit into a medium.
I felt like this dress was extremely flattering in my body. It hugged all the right places and made areas pop out that I wanted to like the girls and booty!

Wearing it makes me feel like a princess. Btw, I’ve received so many compliments on this piece! It looks chic and feels soft, plus it’s easy to clean. I wear a size S, and the Small fit perfectly. Highly recommend!
Love the fit of this dress!
I'd buy this in every color. Super flattering. Giving cottage core 10/10 no complaints. Has a lining so it's not see-through

评论概述: I’ve never felt so colorful and fun
评论详情: Color was vibrant (holds up after wash - didn’t bleed on anything either). Easy to iron. I was able to tuck the strings into the top after tying in a bow (I didn’t want the strings to show personal preference but I think it looks beautiful on anyone either way). The slit was not too high which is good if someone wanted to wear spanx (hate chaffing right!). But truly stunning and the perfect color to wear to a colorful themed wedding reception dance party. Such a fun beautiful dress with good spin/twirl to the skirt :)
Too long, I’m 5’2 I got a medium since I’m a bit thicker, and the material is not the best it’s like a table cloth sheet but it doesn’t look bad!

The dress is structured really nicely! But the material is 100% synthetic and feels like costume quality…. The colors are not 100% to the photos. I got the green one, and it’s a lot brighter, not really that earthy sage green. Was hoping to wear this to a fall wedding, but it’s much more of a spring sage than a fall sage if you know what I mean. I’m debating returning it, just because for the price it’s a little disappointing that it’s costume material… I’m 5’3 and weigh roughly 162-167lbs, I lift weights so I have a good amount of back muscle, and the M fits me really well. The stretchy material in the back is great for wider/built backs.
Got many compliments when I wore this dress! I ordered an XL and it fit perfectly! (185lbs, 5’5 for reference). Will be buying other colors

评论概述: Great dress, but the color is brighter than pictured
评论详情: Great fit, and a really comfortable dress! Just keep in mind the color is a bit of a brighter blue than pictured.
True to size! Wore to a Bridgerton tea party and wentbveryvwell with the theme!
I didn't like the feeling of this fabric
Dress runs big.. got medium but it was very loose. The arms are too puffy and big also.this dress is more for tall and slim people.
If you’ve ever doubted yourself in dresses. Buy this dress and you’ll feel confident!
Got so many compliments and people staring as I walked by. Love it! Fits true to size.

So soft and extremely flattering. I am in love with this dress. I was hesitant to purchase for the price but it was definitely worth it. I bought it to wear to dinner for my anniversary and my husband loved it. It is a tiny bit bigger than I would like so maybe go down a size if you're in-between.

All the colors state they are 100% polyester except 2. 2 state they are 100% cotton, so I bought a color that said it was 100% cotton. Turns out it’s polyester and the Amazon page is just lying to your face.

I was concerned that I looked a little too much like Mary-the-Milkmaid in this dress but I got several compliments when I wore it. It's very comfortable/easy to wear. Although the pattern is a bit sweeter than I normally wear, I like it a lot and have decided to embrace the innocent vibe.  From other review-photos, I can see that it looks great on various body types. For a pretty, sweet look, I highly recommend this dress.

I got a ton of compliments in this dress. I really like the way it accented the right curves and hid the others. It slimmed my figure some. I really enjoyed wearing this, it was comfortable too! I am very large busted and it accommodated that too. I highly recommend it!

My dress got delivered with multiple huge yellow stains on it. It smelt like someone had already worn it. The dress quality wasn’t great but not terrible. I was hoping it would work because all the good reviews but super disappointed that I paid for a dirty dress.
The XS was too large on my chest and waist. For reference, I'm 5'4", 100 lbs. Chest: 28 inches, waist: 24 inches
The description said it was cotton, it isn’t.
Just received the dress today & it was clearly worn by someone else as it was dirty inside. Will be returning ASAP. Not sure if I will order another one.

LOVE. So comfortable and breathable. Wore it to a garden party themed wedding and it was amazing. Good length for me and decent chest coverage. Some reviews said you don’t need a bra with it. I would agree if I wasn’t as conscious. I used boob tape and it was supportive enough.

I’m still not sure I want to spend over $50 on this beautiful sundress, but it’s really nice and very comfortable. I’m about 5’8, 165 pounds and I bought a large and it fits great. It even has a little skirt underneath.

评论概述: So cute I bought it in two colors
评论详情: Comfortable, flirty, and great for summer.  I love the flattering design and the slit makes walking a breeze.  Love that it has lining.  Perfect length!  Great for travel.  I would say the fabric is a little scratchy, but it’s polyester, so what do you expect?  Overall, love this. Medium was perfect.

I ordered the blue with pink flowers and the colors are a lot more vibrant in person, not pastel or muted. The fabric feels like a Halloween or ‘dress up’ costume which makes it look very cheap. If the fabric was cotton or literally anything else, I think it could’ve had potential. Definitely not worth the price with how cheap it looks.
Cute dress, good fit but too sheer.

Wore this dress two weeks after buying it. After steaming it for the first time to get the wrinkles out, it REEKED of armpits, leading me to believe that it was worn before, returned without washing, and then resold to me. No amount of perfume can cover this up and unfortunately I have to leave in ten mins so i can’t wash it 🙃. dress is cute though
It’s actually pretty high quality and fits perfectly!

评论概述: Really like this dress but a little tight in the arms
评论详情: I really like this dress it is very comfortable to wear ,The fabric is very lightweight. It doesn't wrinkle. My only complaint is it is a little tight in the arms ,but not too tight that it's completely uncomfortable. Otherwise I'd say this dress is worth the price
This dress is so cute! The color & the fit was perfect!

I’m usually not the one to return things. I usually just chalk things up as a loss and give it to someone. This dress wasn’t even good enough for that. The material was that of like a windbreaker material. Cheap and a horrible purchase.
I’m 5’2”, 135 lbs and bought the medium. It fits like a glove! I received so many compliments in this. Will definitely buy one in another color for my birthday.
I love the dress a little disappointed that it didn’t come with the slit on mine.
This dress is very flattering and trendy. Only negative is the inside of the dress is white with no print.
I liked everything about this dress. It fit true to size. The color was great. I got a lot of compliments when I wore it to a wedding. Love the dresses.

I purchased two of these dresses because I loved the first one I bought so much and I wanted it in another color. They are good quality construction, the fit is flattering and I get compliments on them everywhere I go!

WIll definitely be buying in other colors! 5'7"/193lb/36DD bought a size Large. Fits like a dream, fabrics is opaque, good material and sewn well. Perfect length for a tall girl, perfect for a larger chest.
This dress is stunning and fit me like a glove! I wore it to a wedding and felt super comfortable in it the whole time.
Cute summer dress, doesn’t feel cheap. I’m 5’2 152lbs and medium fit perfect. Skirt is lined and you can wear this without a bra. Overall I liked it but not the $58 price tag.

评论概述: Weird material, unflattering on large chests
评论详情: The material was not stretchy or forgiving. The chest is way too small and they run very small as well.
So flattering and comfortable
Wore the dress twice and the seams came apart on the sleeves and the bust. Very disappointing.
product description said "100% cotton" it's polyester and feels cheap

This is a nicely constructed dress. I have the black in a small. It fits TTS (26” waist, 32” bust) and is very flattering. As the title says, I think this is a good *alternative* to the House of CB Tallulah dress if you don’t want to dish out $200+. It has a smock back as opposed to a zipper back. The biggest con is that the material feels really cheap (I’m aware that it’s polyester lol). The black fabric in particular has a weird sheen to it, which I don’t love either. But, if you’re willing to get past that, then I don’t see why you shouldn’t buy it.

the fabric is a little stiff and cheaper but nothing that a quick wash cant soften! really pleased with the shape this dress gives me! as a 34DDD i was a little concerned about my boobs spilling out but the fabric is enough to cover them and the bodice is tight to hold them up! i feel very feminie and pretty wearing the dress and hats hard for me as im a bigger body girl with a wide rib cage haha

I normally don’t buy long dresses since I’m 5’2” & they’re usually too long. However this one fit perfectly & I’m so glad I got it! I got it in white with green/yellow flowers. I only wish the fabric around the chest area was thicker so I could be confident that I won’t flash anyone if I’m not wearing a bra. Also, I’m a 40D & it fit well but I feel like there could be spillage if they were bigger

There’s a lot of dupes for this dress but I think this listing has the best quality and also the smocking in the back of the dress instead of a zipper is super comfortable and forgiving if you’re in between sizes or if you’re pregnant - I got a medium and I’m 28 weeks pregnant (5ft, currently 138lbs). I got the Floral White and the design does not look quite like the listing photo but it’s decent.
Nice fabric, comfortable, very flattering

评论概述: Sizing is pretty inaccurate but its still cute
评论详情: I'm 5' 5", 125-130lbs  28" waist  37" bust. By the listing's measurements, I should be in a large, maybe even an xl by the bust (I am very much not an XL bust  but I'm flattered.) Amazon recommended a small, measurements said large so I went with medium. It fits just fine, a little longer than expected (goes down to my ankles), I have room to spare in the waist and chest (don't expect this to give you much of a cleavage situation if you're a C cup) I could've gone with a small but the medium will work too, its just less snatched at the waist. It's not transparent and you can wear this with pretty much any underwear and a sticky bra. Overall, it's cute, and very breathable.

Dress is cute but unflattering on me. I’m 5’9 and the dress hit at an awkward spot. i thought it would stop just below the knee but it was almost to my ankles. It was cute & comfortable but the style just wasn’t for me!

My bust is 40 inches and my waist is 32 inches and I went with a large! It honestly is a little longer than I would have liked but it’s still the most precious thing in the world! If you’re thinking about buying I 10/10 recommend it! I’m probably going to order a bunch more in different colors!

评论概述: Get an iron and you'll be fine with it!
评论详情: I am 5'6, 145lbs, and I got a small - fits perfectly. It arrived very crushed, so you'll definitely need to iron it.
The dress fits, love the color, and feel extremely feminine in it. Definitely bringing this dress with me to Nashville!

I wanted to love this dress because it was very cute when I tried it on, however, the fabric is very cheap. The fabric almost reminds me of a shower curtain liner! I was expecting something more breathable and soft.
The dress fit well and it's lined. I got a lot of compliments on it and it feels very well made.

评论概述: Def not for those with smaller chests
评论详情: Context: I'm 5'3, 170lbs, 36D  A size Large fit me perfectly. I would definitely say this dress is not for those with smaller bra sizes. I wear a 36D and the chest area is almost too large for me. Also for my height, the dress comes all the way down to my ankles so careful of the length if you're on the shorter side!
super flattering!! I'm 5'8" and it hits at the perf spot on my legs. I'm a 32C and the top isn't too big. about 140lbs and I ordered a medium, which is what I normally wear!

THIS DRESS IS SO GORGEOUS. I had bought it for my birthday and it shipped super quick. For reference I am 5’7 and have a 34DD bust. I bought a small and it fit so well on me. I would say it may be long if you are shorter. The dress wasn’t sheer and it’s very lightweight which I personally liked. Definitely recommend this dress.

评论概述: SO Flattering - better quality than expected
评论详情: I LOVE this dress. It felt like a thicker fabric than I was expecting and the waistline was soooo flattering. The slit isn't a mile high so it doesn't feel tacky. I want this dress in all the colors now!

I couldn’t get past how much material was in the bottom of the dress. Not flattering at all because it’s not the style I like or wanted. Looks  nothing like to picture shown.

评论概述: Beautiful quality!! You want this dress!!
评论详情: I was hesitant because you never know what you're gonna get on Amazon.  But I bought this dress for Easter Sunday and let me just say, the quality is amazing!! No regrets!! It's so beautiful, I felt like snow white in this dress. It's soft and flowy and fit me perfectly.  I wanna buy this dress in more colors for sure. For reference I'm 5'5" and 130lbs and I bought a small.
It was a little more than I would have liked to pay, especially for the type of material, but it is so lovely. I'm 5'6", 125lb, 34D and the small fit me perfectly.

评论概述: For a bride on a budget!
评论详情: I wore this to my bridal shower and it was a hit! I loved the shape, print, and fit! It made me feel beautiful and bridal for this day. Was comfortable and fancy at the same time.

评论概述: Too long and fabric is strange
评论详情: I ordered xs and it’s still too long. Fabric is like nylon. I don’t recommend it.

Was a fun dress!!! Everyone loved it! I was 30 weeks pregnant here. I didn’t wear a bra. The boob area has some getting use to since it’s on the small size and luckily i don’t have big boobs so mine fit perfectly. There was enough stretch to fit my pregnant body in it. Very flowy and fun dress! Can’t wait to wear postpartum.

cheap material, horrible fit, i usually perfectly fit the model size, also if you’re not 5’10 it will look like a peasant dress rather than a cute picnic or baby shower vibe…. 1/10. also the floral didn’t look like it did in pics
My daughter chose this dress as one of her outfits for her senior photos. She loved it and I loved that it was affordable but also nice quality and fit well.
it was a really pretty dress that I wore to a bat mitzvah. It’s flattering and well put together

My gosh this looked terrible. The quality is worse than and old bed sheet. The picture makes me think it looks sexy. In reality it looks like I’m playing dressup with my grandmas bed spread. Idk I have a feeling these pictures are from the REAL site with the REAL dress but to quote my dad, “You better get a new dress before you see that boyfriend of yours because this AINT it.

评论概述: Cute-- not for my thick big booby girlies
评论详情: Quality and design are sooo cute but definitely not supportive of the big mommy hubba bubbas.... sad that I had to return this.
The dress is not see through.
Beautiful dress and excellent quality! Love the front slit and this dress is well made with inner lining … which is a plus! Highly recommend it! Love the design of the dress flow as well
It’s so feminine and flowy but the fabric is really good quality. It’s fully lined and it looks and feels more expensive than it was. Works good for small chest
It’s such a beautiful dress. The quality was great. The fabric was not transparent. It fit perfectly. It covered the chest area well.
I love this dress. I could have sized down but the medium fits great. 5’0” 135lbs, 34DD It’s flowy, and looks so elegant on. Good stretch on the back torso.
The dress fit well, looked like the picture, and was decent quality. I would definitely purchase again!
It's so CUTE! I feel like a princess in this dress. Im 5'2 and it is a little long in length, but with heels it fixes it. I don't regret buying it. I got in a size Medium and fits SO good.
Fits well, stretchy, not see thru, color is  nice, needs steamed.
Sooo cute, awesome for around the waist.. BUT not for big boobs!
This is the most gorgeous dress! I bought It for a wedding and now I wanna Wear it every day 😂 it’s super comfy and very flattering!

It’s cute but it’s definitely a lot heavier than I expected. I wore it for about 5 hours and when I got home I noticed that there was an outline of dye left on my skin which was a little concerning. I washed it before wearing it so there’s no reason a mark should have appeared
I loved it. The quality is great and it’s not really thin. It had fabric under. It’s very flattering <3
Sizing runs on the small side, and made of very cheap fabric.

Not flattering in the bust area. I got a medium and should’ve gone with a small. The bust area is so loose and big. I have to tie more than the strings, I end up tying the fabric too so that it doesn’t look so odd if that makes sense.
I didn’t order it in this color but I kinda like this color. I’m 5”3, around 180, 38D cup size. kinda small on my breast but overall comfy 8/10

I went to a wedding in the woods, and needed a casual but functioning dress. This did the trick, I felt like a fairy, the only issue is I cannot get the wrinkles out of it! I washed it and hung it to dry and it still had the wrinkles from shipping! I probably needed a steamer but I was in the woods and just had to deal with it being a little wrinkled! Otherwise i got tons of compliments and I really liked it! I’m a 36d and I usually wear a large, sometimes xl for bottoms, and this fit great in a large.

This is how the baby pink looks. It’s a lot brighter in person. I picked this dress because it said cotton material but it’s polyester. It’s fits me at an awkward length. I’m 5’6. I would still say it’s super cute. Wish it was longer or shorter .

Very pretty and light summer dress. I’m 5’6” and guessing around 140ish lbs. I’m 7 months postpartum and wanted something pretty and not clingy as I’m still working on my post pregnant body. I felt great in this dress. Also didn’t need to wear a bra which is a plus
Gorgeous dress, true to size, nice quality and material and I would highly recommend.
It snatches you up in all the right places, so flattering and beautiful

Wore this to a wine tasting trip in Tuscany. Got so many compliments! It is extremely flattering in all the right places and comfortable. It was also very breathable although it does seem like it is heavy material. Runs a little big for people between sizes.

评论概述: Love the dress, not the pattern
评论详情: This dress is actually really cute and flattering, and although I’m normally a L or size 12, I went with an XL, which I think was a good move. I love this dress, but I will probably send it back for a different color, because I feel like I look like st Patrick’s day. Also the white lining is a little too obvious against the green
Fits well, nice material and quality. I got lots of compliments wearing this.

This dress after just one wear is one of if not my favorite now. I definitely plan on buying this in more patterns. It’s super lightweight, comfortable, and flattering. There’s some (good) stretch in the back, but still a nice fit flair style. Also I ordered this dress and it came in less than 12 hours. A MUST buy for sure.
This dress has a great cut. The fabric is a bit cheap, but meh. It isn't see thru! It really is a flattering cut.

评论概述: Green is terrible and the fabric sucks
评论详情: The green is not the same green in the photo. It is more of a St Patrick's green. The fabric feels like costume fabric. Its thin and cheap.  I returned this item.
